attacks.name: Ascension
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Wurmple and put it on Wurmple. (This counts as evolving Wurmple.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Miracle Essence
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 Special Condition. Each Defending Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.
